author: Special Correspondent
text:
Private candidates who wish to appear for the standard VIII public examinations to be held in April 2016 can apply online through the nodal centres from February 18 to 29, V.Murugan, Regional Deputy Director of Government Examinations, Tiruchi, said in a press release. Candidates can file their applications online through the designated nodal centres, notified in the website: www.tndge.in Candidates would have to apply only online and application sent through post would be rejected.

They would have to pay an examination fee of Rs.125 besides the application registration fee of Rs.50 at the nodal centres.
title: Only online applications are accepted for public exam
